title: nf-core/grzqc pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input

sample.errorMessage: Sample name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

libraryType.errorMessage: Library type must be one of the followings: panel, wgs, wes, panel_lr, wgs_lr, wes_lr

sequenceSubtype.errorMessage: Library type must be either somatic or germline

genomicStudySubtype.errorMessage: Library type must be either tumor+germline, tumor-only or germline-only

fastq_1.errorMessage: FastQ file for reads 1 must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fq.gz' or '.fastq.gz'

fastq_2.errorMessage: FastQ file for reads 2 cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fq.gz' or '.fastq.gz'

reference.errorMessage: The reference genome has to be either GRCh37 or GRCh38
